Text: Final sequence is the greatest fight i have seen in any Jackie Chan film. A must see movie for every Chan fan.

Very nice movie with the superstar Jackie Chan starring. In this movie Jackie Chan impersonates Lung whose grandfather is murdered. Then, Lung plans his vengeance and is aided by a crippled kung fu master who imparts to him a new kind of "emotional kung fu". Mentally and physically ready, Lung finally seeks out the wicked general to see justice done..For more information go to wing-chunws/Fearless%20Hyena.html
